summary: Breezehome with more chests, new decorations and an enchantment table. In this Edition there is a basement.
descriptionHtml:
This is my second mod and if you like it, you can endorse it !

I made this mod because I love Breezehome, but some things miss in this house. I have added some plants, an enchantment table, more chests which have names and there is now more space because I have changed the dining room table. There is also two Shrines : The Shrine of Arkay and the Shrine of Kynareth. In the Basement Edition there is... a Basement ! In this basement there is four mannequins, there is also four display cases and I have added a workbench and an anvil (You can upgrade your weapons but you can\'t forge with this anvil).

(I am french so please, do not blame me for my poor english... Thanks)

My first mod which is also the first version of this mod : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37488//?

No DLC required.
I use the last update of Skyrim, so I suppose you must have the last update too...
There is no new meshes or new textures. Made with CK.
author: BoD - BeardOfDarkness
